Text.Page:
The argons were up to something here in Raga Shadiâ€”I just know it.

Not many clues, though. Just the thick, keratinized skin of {@LinkCreature:46#303#argonomorph blood fiends}. It's a grisly task, but could you gather some, um, "fresh" skin so I can compare with the, um, "vintage" samples I have?

Now I get to employ the taxidermy skills my uncle taught me. Not exactly how I thought I'd put that skill to use.

Raga Evala needs your help more than I do here...unless you were a taxidermist before the war? No? I thought not.

Bring them this. It's a simple wildflower that's been argonized. Creepy, but rather interesting.
Please bring me the keratinized skin of the argonomorph blood fiends. It's for research, not trophies.

You have an intact argonized wildflower? So far we've just found fragments.

The argons are clearly capable of transforming the vegetation of an entire region, but we don't know how they do it, much less how to stop it.
